about_the_game:
A calm game about the breaks on a journey


Features


  • Experience the calm and wholesome atmosphere of evenings at the campfire.
  • Handdrawn unique art style and animations to highlight a wholesome cast of characters.
  • Soundtrack which captures the wholesomeness and calmness of the breaks on a journey.
  • Non-combat-focused rogue-like gameplay! Encounters are meeting new travelers and figuring out what they need rather than how to harm them.

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: Fireside is a wholesome and calm game about the breaks on a journey. Trade and talk at the campfire, rebuild your shrine with the energy you gathered and invite friends you made along the way to visit you at your home.
